import React from'react';import{Container,Col,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import'../css/Profile.css';import{faFacebook,faGithub,faLinkedin}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';// Value Import
import{information,socials}from'../EditMe';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Profile(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{fluid:true,className:"profile-row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{className:"column-greeting",xs:12,lg:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"greeting-sub",children:information.welcomeMsg}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"greeting-name",children:information.fullName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{className:"column-profile",xs:12,lg:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile-img",src:information.profilePhoto,alt:information.fullName+"'s profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-socials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",href:socials.facebookURL,className:"profile-facebook",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faFacebook})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",href:socials.githubURL,className:"profile-github",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",href:socials.linkedinURL,className:"profile-linkedin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faLinkedin})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{className:"column-status",xs:12,lg:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lower-profile-text",children:information.aboutMe}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"lower-profile-text-sub",children:information.companyName})]})]})});}export default Profile;
